page.title: 09Mr Hardwick The butcher
page.content: Mr Hardwick has lived in Corringham for twenty years. He has been a butcher for nineteen years and started when he was twenty-four. About a hundred years ago his shop was a grocery shop, but like other premises in the village it has had a change of use. Some shops have closed altogether so that today the only other shop in the village is the post office. Mr Hardwick enjoys his job and tries to make enough profit to be able to buy new machinery. His typical working day consists of an early start to try to get every thing ready for customers,preparing the van round, and making up customers orders. He works about ten hours a day,and has three people to help in the shop.
